name: llamatic
description: Lightweight local llama.cpp model manager (no Electron)
author: Isht-Wow

scripts.build:mac:app:arm64: pkg . -t node18-macos-arm64 -o llamatic-arm64 && codesign -f -s - llamatic-arm64 && ./build_app.sh Llamatic llamatic-arm64 Llamatic.jpeg
scripts.build:mac:app:intel: pkg . -t node18-macos-x64 -o llamatic-intel && codesign -f -s - llamatic-intel && ./build_app.sh Llamatic-Intel llamatic-intel Llamatic.jpeg
